title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2
notes: Controller does not function, keyboard controls work flawlessly.

Game starts just fine, graphical options work but when you the actual game starts, first mission... the cutscene won't play and the game will not work anymore. Controller and KB+M are unresponsive from that moment onward.
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

notes: Game starts, graphics are ok, but stutters every couple seconds and crashes after the first minutes of gameplay. Unplayable in current state.
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

notes: Music and voices work, but seems like none of the sound effects do.
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

notes: Music sometimes loops after a few seconds; and the game has some random framerate drops / stuttering.
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

notes:
Game does not run beyond the "New game" or "Load game" option resulting in a black screen with clouds. 

Temporary fix is to do the following:


1)    Go to the game folder /Steam/common/LEGO Marvel Super Heroes 2

2)    Rename "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe" to "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe.back"

3)    Rename "LEGOMARVEL2.exe" to "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe"

4)    Start the game you would normally and enjoy the game.
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

notes: Can verify that the game works very well with the temporary fix listed by the below report (Rename "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe" to "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe.back" and Rename "LEGOMARVEL2.exe" to "LEGOMARVEL2_DX11.exe")
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2

gpu: X.Org AMD Radeon (TM) RX 480 Graphics (POLARIS10 / DRM 3.23.0 / 4.15.0-36-generic, LLVM 6.0.0)
notes: Tried the below fix for renaming the exe files but once done so Steam errors with "It requires a graphics card which supports DX11"
title: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2
